price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߒ߬ ߕߊߢߐ߲߯ߓߐ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߒ߬ߓߵߊ߬ ߝߟߍ߫ ߓߊ߫ ߡߊ߬ߛߐ߬ߛߐ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊߓߊ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߢߊ ߡߍ߲
arabic: فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fa-intaqamnā min'hum fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-mukadhibīna
